meanings.sent2: I learned about glassmaking in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved a mysterious glassmaking process.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity sparkled through her glassmaking abilities.
meanings.sent5: The art of glassmaking is both delicate and beautiful.

meanings.definition: The art or craft of making glass objects.
meanings.sent1: Glassmaking artists create stunning pieces of art.
meanings.sent2: I admire the intricate details in glassmaking sculptures.
meanings.sent3: The glassmaking master turned sand into exquisite vases.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for glassmaking shone through her work.
meanings.sent5: The gallery showcased various forms of glassmaking artistry.

meanings.definition: The industry or business of producing glass products.
meanings.sent2: The demand for quality glassmaking has been increasing.
meanings.sent3: The glassmaking company celebrated its anniversary with a new product line.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, glassmaking plays a significant role.
meanings.sent5: The glassmaking industry contributes to the economy through exports.
